DOC.HEAD: List of Major Works By Samuel Beckett
With PM-Obit-Beckett, Bjt
DOC.TEXT: Here is a list of some major works by Samuel Beckett, winner of the 1969 Nobel Prize for Literature, who has died at the age of 83:

STAGE PLAYS: Waiting for Godot, 1952 Endgame, 1957 Krapp's Last Tape, 1959 Happy Days, 1960 Play, 1963 Not I, 1973 Rockaby, 1981 Radio Plays: All that Fall, 1957 Embers, 1959 Words and Music, 1961 Cascando, 1964 Ends and Odds, 1977
NOVELS: Murphy, 1938 Watt, 1944 Mercier et Camier, 1946 (English edition, 1974) Molloy, 1951 (English edition, 1956) Imagination Dead Imagine, 1966 Ill Seen, Ill Said, 1982 Stirrings Still, 1989
